content.question: In a hypothesis test for a single proportion, which of the following is assumed for the calculation of the <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-value?

choices.label: The distribution of the population is approximately normal.
The sample proportion is equal to the hypothesized proportion.
The sample size is 30 or more.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
